job_title: Certified Medical Coder in Pella, IA
pros: Understanding boss in HIM, willing to work with employees. Enjoy the option to work from home.
cons: Have to work during business hours currently. Have to gain any PTO.

pros: Clean, Organized, Friendly and Understanding of family emergencies

review_title: It’s a great company to work for!
job_title: Patient Service Representative in Knoxville, IA
pros: They treat their employees very well- they hold all sorts of free facility-wide events throughout the year to boost morale. They make each individual feel important
cons: Poor parking for employees .. the PTO/holiday pay isn’t the greatest. They don’t always follow through with plans they tell you about

pros: Great Doctors to work with. Very caring staff. Love my coworker. Benefits are great. Even get benefits for weekend package
cons: No negatives working at Pella. Have been very happy withing here. Oh maybe one thing. Would like to have option of 8 hour shifts again.

pros: Clean, great staff!  For small community hospital it has a lot to offer!
cons: There is nothing that comes to mind
